snippet: The average temperature in January in the United States was 36.3 degrees Fahrenheit -- 5.5 degrees warmer than the average for the 20th century.
abstract: The average temperature in January in the United States was 36.3 degrees Fahrenheit -- 5.5 degrees warmer than the average for the 20th century.
lead_paragraph: The National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration has posted a striking series of maps on last month's temperatures and precipitation in the United States. (Explore the links highlighting differences among regions, states and cities.) The average temperature in January was 36.3 degrees Fahrenheit -- 5.5 degrees warmer than the average for the 20th century.
